meanings.definition: Of or relating to the home or family.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the cozy, domestic atmosphere of her house.
meanings.sent2: The family spent a lovely evening together in their domestic setting.
meanings.sent3: The domestic scene of the children trying to bake cookies was both chaotic and heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room, creating a domestic glow of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The domestic bliss of a peaceful Sunday morning filled her heart with contentment.

meanings.definition: A person who is paid to help with household tasks.
meanings.sent1: The domestic arrived early to start cleaning the house.
meanings.sent2: She hired a domestic to assist with cooking and laundry.
meanings.sent3: The domestic accidentally vacuumed up the cat's toy, causing a playful chase around the house.
meanings.sent4: The domestic's efficiency in organizing the pantry was like watching a magician at work.
meanings.sent5: The domestic's cheerful demeanor brightened up the entire household.

meanings.definition: A product made in one's own country.
meanings.sent1: The store proudly displayed a variety of domestic goods.
meanings.sent2: She preferred buying domestic products to support local businesses.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to use only domestic ingredients for the special dish.
meanings.sent4: The quality of the domestic wine rivaled that of imported varieties.
meanings.sent5: The market showcased a range of fresh domestic produce.
